nodes.text: Cassius Madine was a Human male commander in the military of the Galactic Republic. He fought against the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and the Galactic War.

In 3642 BBY, Madine was stationed on Balmorra to aid the resistance against the Sith Empire. During that time, he became obsessed with the superweapon known as the Barrager, believing it could help the Republic prevent another Sacking of Coruscant.
Commander Madine's first name is revealed in a in-game mail message from Lieutenant Dannax concerning the commander's transfer request.
